Class AttachingStreamCodec<B extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf,V>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.codextra.api.attach.stream.AttachingStreamCodec<B,V>
Type Parameters:
B - the buffer type.

All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<B,V>, net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamDecoder<B,V>, net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamEncoder<B,V>
public class AttachingStreamCodec<B extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf,V> extends Object implements net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<B,V>
A StreamCodec for attaching a value and passing it as context to the wrapped codec.
